title: Cinnamon apple scones
ingredients: ['250g plain flour', '50g caster sugar', '1 small pinch salt', '1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder', '50g unsalted butter', '1 Granny Smith or medium sized Bramley apple, finely chopped', '2 teaspoons cinnamon', '35g sultanas', '125ml full fat milk', '1 egg, beaten, to glaze']
